documentation.author: Karen Speaks
documentation.purpose: v3 added ord logic to exclude some catalog cds for CRIT Ticket 390750 rule to print a expedite report for following critical lab results for IP/observation/ED hold patients and have discharge location on the report. Associated Scripts: bc_eks_specimen_type: CCL script to set results with specimen type; parameter "CSF"> link is required bc_eks_micro_positive: CCL script to set results with positive micro; no parameter > link is requried bc_eks_print_expedite_lab: CL script to print lab report; parameters ouput(printer/file/email addr must include @baycare.org), report_type("MICRO" or "LAB"), 0.0 > link is required ; executes bc_pc_rpt_expedite_lab_lo
documentation.explanation: IP/Observation/ER Hold Discharged Critical Results Log A. Gen Lab 1. Labs with Critical Value flag B. Micro Labs 1. Blood Culture (all specimen type): Positive Indicator 2. CSF Culture (all specimen type): Positive indicator 3. AFB Culture (all specimen type): Positive indicator 4. AFB Stain (all specimen type): Positive Normalcy 5. EBV PCR Quantitative (Specimen type: CSF): Positive Normalcy
documentation.keywords: expedite labs critical expedite micro Blood Culture CSF Culture AFB Culture AFB Stain EBV PCR Quantitative

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_STATUS_E
templateDefinitions.definition: EVENT_SET_NAME is in any of the statuses listed: STATUS

statements.statement:
eks_event_set_name_refhelp PAR1, "EVENT_SET" go
/* SELECT IF (PAR1="*ANY") EVENT_SET_NAME="*ANY_EVENT_SET_NAME" ELSEIF (PAR1="ALL") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSE EVENT_SET_NAME= V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,V.EVENT_SET_NAME)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ENDIF */

eks_codeset_cki_refhelp "8","CKI","*ANY_STATUS" go /* select distinct Result_Status = if (t.seq = 1) cv.description else "*ANY_STATUS" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) cv.code_value else 0.0 endif from code_value cv, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan cv where cv.code_set = 8 and cv.active_ind = 1 and cv.cdf_meaning > " " join t order Result_Status */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_NORMALCY_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request for event set name of EVENT_SET_NAME and a event class of EVENT_CLASS with a result status RESULT_STATUS is NORMALCY

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_NORMALCY_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request for event set name of EVENT_SET_NAME and a event class of EVENT_CLASS with a result status RESULT_STATUS is NORMALCY

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST for any order(s) in LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXEC_CCL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Execute PROGRAM_NAME with parameters OPT_PARAM and link to OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXEC_CCL_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Execute a program PROGRAM_NAME with parameters OPT_PARAM and link to OPT_LINK.
